subject: Haskell Invitational
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Kelly Breen, who grew up in Old Bridge, N.J., will saddle two strong contenders, Pants on Fire and Ruler on Ice, in Sunday’s Haskell Invitational at Monmouth Park.
snippet: Kelly Breen, who grew up in Old Bridge, N.J., will saddle two strong contenders, Pants on Fire and Ruler on Ice, in Sunday’s Haskell Invitational at Monmouth Park.
